name: treatment of used purse seiner, wood | used purse seiner, wood | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/18388/documentation

This dataset represents the end of life of wooden purse seiners, per 1000 kg of light ship weight, based on data from Peru, corresponding to 10 vessels for which data was avilable with different levels of detail. Specific data for specific inventory items may be based on sub-samples for which detailed data was available. Vessel dimensions, landings and fuel use were available for roughly 689 purse seiners;System boundaries and relation between activities

Treatment of used vessel (recycling)

End of life (decommissioning). Excludes engines and motors. Excludes energy for dismantling.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/03:Fishing and aquaculture/031:Fishing/0311:Marine fishing
tags: Sector: Fishing & Aquaculture; Waste Treatment & Recycling

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data from Peru, extrapolated to global (GLO)
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Peru features various shipyards and relevant ship-building and ship-retrofitting expertise.

exchanges.description: EOL of a purse seiner, per 1000 kg of light ship weight (LSW), after 30 years lifetime. Regressions based on mainly primary data were created to relate the weight of each inventory item to a purse seiner's LSW. The list of inventory items (granularity) contribute >95% of environmental impacts, as described in the reference publication.
